com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu

类 MaterialMenuIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu.MaterialMenuBase
      • com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu.MaterialMenuIcon
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MaterialMenu

    public class MaterialMenuIcon
extends MaterialMenuBase
    A helper class for implementing MaterialMenuDrawable as an ActionBar icon.

    In order to preserve default ActionBar icon click state call MaterialMenuBase.setNeverDrawTouch(boolean). Otherwise, adjust your theme to disable pressed background color by setting android:actionBarItemBackground to null and use android:actionButtonStyle, android:actionOverflowButtonStyle to enable other menu icon backgrounds.

    Disables ActionBar Up arrow and replaces default drawable using ActionBar.setIcon(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable)
